name: TimeWarp
description:
This is the Work-In-Progress page for TimeWarp. This project was started as an assignment for my course "3D4Games" at Digital Arts and Entertainment. The current version is a working prototype of the core mechanics, using placeholder art. The level itself is also fairly quickly put-together, and ramps up in difficulty quite quickly. Furthermore I'd like to experiment with different styles of cameras, as I'm not satisfied with the current Top-Down gameplay.

The goal for this project, is to expand upon the current version [essentially a prototype], add more ways to manipulate time [already implemented but currently unused], and create a fun, but challenging gameplay experience in the vein of Portal.

Any and all feedback would be greatly appreciated!
